RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Cook pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Mix eggs and parmesan cheese, then combine with spaghetti and pancetta.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: A quick and healthy stir fry loaded with fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Heat oil in a pan and sauté ginger until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for a few minutes.
Pour soy sauce over vegetables, mix well, and serve hot.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: Classic Mexican-style tacos with seasoned beef and fresh toppings.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Cook ground beef in a pan until browned.
Warm tortillas and prepare toppings.
Assemble tacos with beef, cheese, lettuce, and tomatoes.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: A traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce on top.
Add mozzarella cheese and basil leaves.
Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C (430°F) for 12-15 minutes.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: A flavorful and aromatic curry dish with tender chicken in a rich sauce.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Sauté onions and garlic in a pan until soft.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Pour in coconut milk and curry powder, then simmer until cooked.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: A refreshing salad with crunchy romaine, creamy dressing, and grilled chicken.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Chop romaine lettuce and place in a bowl.
Grill chicken breast and slice into strips.
Add croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing, then toss well.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: A simple and delicious salmon dish with lemon and garlic butter sauce.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and garlic.
Pan-fry salmon in butter until golden brown.
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the salmon and garnish with parsley.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: A vegetarian alternative to pulled pork, slow-cooked in BBQ sauce.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Shred jackfruit and cook in a pan with BBQ sauce.
Toast buns and prepare coleslaw.
Assemble sandwich with BBQ jackfruit, coleslaw, and pickles.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: Bell peppers stuffed with a hearty and flavorful rice and bean mixture.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Cook rice and mix with tomato sauce, beans, and corn.
Cut bell peppers in half and remove seeds.
Stuff peppers with rice mixture and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20 minutes.

RecipesCollection.recipeDescription: Classic homemade cookies with a crispy edge and a chewy center.

cookingProcess.stepDescription: Mix flour, sugar, and butter in a bowl.
Add eggs and chocolate chips, then mix well.
Scoop onto a baking sheet and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 12 minutes.
